game.name: FPV Labs - Drone Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Learn and master FPV Drone flying with true-to-life physics, next-gen visuals, and advanced flight dynamics. Handcrafted, real-world inspired locations with an unmatched level of detail.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Learn and master FPV Drone flying with true-to-life physics, next-gen visuals, and advanced flight dynamics. Handcrafted, real-world inspired locations with an unmatched level of detail.
